tidbits.title: Reggae and Music Culture
tidbits.description: Jamaica is renowned for its music culture, particularly reggae, and its global icon, Bob Marley, whose music embodies the spirit of the nation.

tidbits.title: Beautiful Beaches
tidbits.description: The country is famous for its stunning beaches like Seven Mile Beach in Negril and Doctor's Cave Beach in Montego Bay, attracting tourists.

tidbits.title: Culinary Delights
tidbits.description: Jamaican cuisine, including jerk chicken, patties, and ackee and saltfish, reflects a blend of African, Indian, and European influences.
